attributes.title: 2022 Hyundai i30 N 2.0 TGDi DCT

attributes.description:
The Sportage 2.0 CRDi sits at the top of the popular SUV range from KIA. The gorgeous looks have further been enhanced with the addition of LED lighting, a panoramic sunroof, and stunning 19 inch alloy wheels. The interior is well appointed, with sumptuous leather heated seats, and an array of safety features for peace of mind. Performance comes courtesy of a 2.0L turbocharged diesel engine, providing 131Kw and a monstrous 400Nm of torque, mated to an ultra smooth 8 speed ZF automatic gearbox, which is enough to blast past slower drivers when overtaking, and at the same time, returning a more than respectable fuel consumption.

Balance of KIA's 5 year / unlimited mileage warranty and a 5 year / 90000Km service plan for hassle free motoring. 

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History At Agents.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many MOTUS Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority!

MOTUS: Live. Love. Drive.

attributes.description:
In a world filled with generic boxes which are devoid of emotional appeal, the Jimny is something totally different and unique. In the city, its diminutive dimensions make it easy to navigate through traffic, and park pretty much anywhere. The Jimny's party trick, is off the beaten track, where it becomes unstoppable. A short wheel-base, short over-hangs, great ground-clearance and a low-range gearbox means that the Jimny will get you out of any trouble that you've found yourself in. 

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

attributes.description:
The Kona is an interesting offering from Hyundai, aimed at a youthful, nonconformist target, and is an honest, colourful and desirable vehicle which is far more interesting than equivalent crossover SUVs. The Kona carries forward Hyundai's undeniable reputation for reliability, and an extensive list of standard features to keep one entertained. Safety is also no compromise, as the Kona is equipped with all the passive and active safety measures for added peace of mind to your driving experience. 

Balance of Hyundai's unrivalled warranty of 7 years / 200000Km, and a 5 year / 90000Km service plan.  

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE
